controller

Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.PlayerController

  • public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
    PlayerController is the controller class for player related function

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerController()
      Creates PlayerController object and initialize playerList with player data from PlayerDAO

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String fullname,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      LandController landCtrl)
        Add new registered player
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the player
        fullname - the fullname of the player
        password - the password of the player
        landCtrl - to create 5 plots of land for player

      • retrieve

        public Player retrieve(java.lang.String username)

        Parameters:

      • updateRank

        public int updateRank(Player player,
                      int exp,
                      RankController rankCtrl)
        Update the rank of player based on experience points
        Parameters:
        player - the player to be updated
        exp - the experience points to be added to the player current experience points
        rankCtrl - to retrieve rank based on player's total exp
        Returns:
        the number of land to add for the player based on rank
